heroHeadline: VITANA HOME - Contemporary Living on the Costa Blanca
heroIntro:
VITANA HOME represents a thoughtful approach to residential development along the Costa Blanca, focusing on quality construction and desirable locations. With 4 available properties currently listed, their portfolio showcases modern architecture and functional design in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations. The developer's flagship development, Los Balcones de Calpe, is positioned in the Arenal Bol area, a vibrant zone known for its proximity to beaches, local amenities, and the charming town of Calpe.

Our agency is pleased to present VITANA HOME's current offerings to discerning buyers seeking new build homes with genuine character and solid construction standards. Whether you're drawn to coastal living or investment potential, these properties merit serious consideration. We provide detailed information on each listing to help you make an informed decision.

aboutSection.title: About VITANA HOME
aboutSection.content:
VITANA HOME has established itself as a developer committed to creating residential spaces that balance modern comfort with respect for their Mediterranean setting. The company prioritizes intelligent design, practical layouts, and quality finishes that appeal to both owner-occupiers and investors looking for rental potential.

The developer's approach centers on delivering homes that suit contemporary lifestyles while maintaining a connection to the local character of the Costa Blanca. Their properties are designed with careful attention to detail, incorporating features that enhance daily living in a coastal environment.

specializationSection.title: Development Specialization
specializationSection.content: VITANA HOME concentrates its development efforts in the Costa Blanca South region, specifically in Calpe and the surrounding areas. Los Balcones de Calpe represents their commitment to the Arenal Bol zone, a location that combines convenient access to amenities with genuine beach proximity. The developer works across multiple property typologies, from compact apartments suitable for first-time buyers to spacious townhouses and villas designed for families and those seeking larger living spaces. This diversified approach ensures their properties appeal to a broad market of potential residents and investors.
